idea-plugin.name: MCP Server
idea-plugin.description:
MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server for IntelliJ IDEs

This plugin integrates the MCP server into IntelliJ-based IDEs, enabling seamless communication between Large Language Models (LLMs) and your development environment. It provides tools for interacting with the IDE, including:

  • Reading the current file
  • Executing terminal commands
  • Setting breakpoints
  • Searching project files
  • And more

To connect with Claude Desktop, you must install and register the MCP Proxy in Claude.

For detailed instructions, visit the GitHub repository.
